@KiKaedutainer The longer you're in it, the harder it gets.

There's 2 versions of content creation careers :

1. An easy, short lived one. 
- Growing on only 1 platform.
- Not reinventing.
- Only focused on short form.

2. The long term career.
- Focusing on short & long form video.
- Reinvention centric.
- The goal : Growth in revenue.
Is content creation a 'difficult job' according to you?

Education is one of the most important gifts that your parents gift you.

Yes, the education system can be drastically improved.

But nothing prepares you for life like :

- Exam Preparation 
- Academic Failure
- The Sports Field
- College Politics
- Heart Ache
- Friendship

Do not chase profit & PR for they are temporary.

Chase longevity & legacy for they can be permanent.
Do not sacrifice your reputation & relationships for profits & PR.
Memories to last a lifetime 🤍 https://t.co/8QDVRnMT49

In the chase for greater visibility, be careful not to overexpose yourself.

Exclusivity & reclusiveness are  powerful methods to portray "clout".

Good PR is an art. 

Less is more.

Being on a podcast is the new PR.

Being on every podcast is the new PR mistake.

See a lot of folks my age completely giving up on eating cheese.

This is different than adopting veganism.

Cheese (& not paneer) seems to be causing skin & stomach trouble for a lot of people.

Need more restaurants serving vegan cheese based options :(

Thoughts?

Spoken to monks, billionaires, soldiers & athletes.

The following is my theory on the journey of the human soul.

These are the wishes of any soul (chronological order) :-

1. Pleasure.

2. Wisdom.

3. Success.

4. Peace.

5. Detachment.

6. Liberation.

Where have you reached?
